template.name: DGC_request_handler
FIFO

location.name: wait_for_passenger
location.label: x <= passenger_wait_time
Make sure passengers can enter and exit

template.name: lift_control

transition.label: dest_floor == current_floors[lift_id]
served[lift_id]!
Destination is the same as soruce
dest_floor != current_floors[lift_id]
close_door[lift_id]!
floors_to_travel := abs(current_floors[lift_id] - dest_floor)

Calculate the length of direction to travel in. Since the first flor needs to be reached, we need the absolute value to be used. Regular target direction would be a problem if 1-0 = 1 (would go up otherwise).
